GSD.product_version: versions from v5.0 to before v5.19.9
GSD.description:
erofs: fix pcluster use-after-free on UP platforms

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.19.9 by commit 94c34faaafe7b55adc2d8d881db195b646959b9e, it was introduced in version v5.0 by commit 73f5c66df3e26ab750cefcb9a3e08c71c9f79cad. For more details please see the references link.
